txt.en: Hemokh can be found wandering around the Hill of Erech to the south-east of Morlad.\n\nYou have encountered Hemokh and should defeat him for the good of the people in Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated Hemokh and the Dead that follow him. Although they shall return, you have provided a brief and much-needed peace for the people of Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated Hemokh and his warband.
Hemokh can be found wandering around the Hill of Erech to the south-east of Morlad.\n\nYou have encountered Hemokh and should defeat him for the good of the people in Blackroot Vale.
Remaining to spite the heir of Isildur, the Ruthless Dead aim to terrify and displace the Gondorians of Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated Hemokh and his band of the Dead!

You have encountered Hemokh and the treacherous oathbreakers that follow him. Choosing to embrace Isildur's curse, the Dead have remained in the Vale to terrify and displace its inhabitants. \n\nWhile defeating Hemokh and the Dead shall not vanquish them forever, the precious respite it will grant to the people of Morlad and beyond ensures its worth.
